itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway pick their NCAA hoops brackets live on air, hours after they came out on Selection Sunday.  They also pick the points spreads for the first 32 games this Thursday and Friday. It's the best time of the year and you can join...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway pick their NCAA hoops brackets live on air, hours after they came out on Selection Sunday.  They also pick the points spreads for the first 32 games this Thursday and Friday. It's the best time of the year and you can join our brackets for free by joining Drinkin' Bros Sports on Facebook!
